overview: In the modern yakuza society where money is the top priority like corporations, young yakuzas of the Nakai sect, Shinobu and Yamamoto, still value loyalty over practicality and are ferocious men who wield power recklessly. After a while, they invade the business premises of the opposing group and wield violence. The boss of Nakaipa, who was displeased with this, fires them and vows revenge...
title: Yakuza - the ultimate in evil
